snippet: An ambitious clinical trial shows promise in protecting children against the disease.
abstract: Editorial notes ambitious clinical trial of malaria vaccine developed by GlaxoSmithKline may be significant advance in the long struggle to control the disease; says trial was in part funded with help from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation; expresses hope the vaccine surmounts remaining scientific and practical hurdles as it is the only broadly tested vaccine on horizon.
lead_paragraph: An ambitious clinical trial shows promise in protecting children against the disease.
